code: import*as Api from"./Api";export const login=data=>{const url="/auth/signin";return PostRequest(url,data);};export const signup=data=>{return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){const obj={url:"/auth/signup",data:data,onSuccess:resp=>{resolve(resp);},onError:err=>{reject(err);console.log("api error",err);}};Api.signUp(obj.url,obj.data,obj.onSuccess,obj.onError);});};export const PostRequest=(url,data)=>{return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){const obj={url:url,data:data,onSuccess:resp=>{resolve(resp);},onError:err=>{reject(err);console.log("api error",err);}};Api.post(obj.url,obj.data,obj.onSuccess,obj.onError);});};
